item.description:
You might want to log this on your calendar for Sunday, May 16 at 5:00 PM. It is a freebie! Tori Murden McClure, author of the 2010 book, A PEARL IN THE STORM, is the first woman and the first American to row solo across the Atlantic Ocean. She will be doing a free discussion in Mystic. The address is:

Mystic Arts Center
9 Water Street,
Mystic, CT 06355

You can also call the Groton Public Library at 860-441-6750 for more info.
item.name: Free Talk by Tori Murden McClure - first woman to row across the Atlantic
